conbody.p: The Shanks Ice Cream Maker is a new machine that'll create amazingly tasty ice cream for English students and professors alike. If youâ€™re tired of the unbearable stress and pressure of English courses or English research, come on over to the Shanks Ice Cream Maker located in room 380 Shanks kitchen! It can create your favorite flavor of delicious frozen yogurt, gelato, sorbet, or ice cream in only a fraction of time! Read these simple instructions to start enjoying ice cream!
